definitions.title: vb. Niph.
definitions.body: be exterminated, destroyed (NH der. Spec.; Aram. [[שְׁמַד]] Pa. cause to apostatize (Jastr); Syr.4amed seems disputed (in Lexx.); Nö:Eut. Nab.32 curse; Ba:ES 10 cites As. ašmud, I destroyed; Gerber:112 thinks vb. denom.);—Pf. 3 ms. consec. [[וְנִשְׁמַד]] Ez Eze 32:12 +, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִשָּׁמֵ]] Is 48:19, Pr 14:11; 2 mpl. [[תִּשָּׁמֵדָוּן]] De 4:26; Inf.abs. [[הִשָּׁמֵד]] v:De 4:26; cstr.sf. [[הִשָּׁמֶדְךָ]] De 28:20, etc.;—†
be destroyed, of bamoth, Ho 10:8, cf. ([[בֵּית רְשָׁעִים]]) Pr 14:11; be devastated, of land, Je 48:8 (‖[[אבר ]]).

annihilate, exterminate: acc. pers. vel gent., subj. ´[[י]]: vel pers. hum., De 1:27, De 2:22 (+ [[מִפְּנֵי]] pers.), De 6:15 (+ [[מֵעַל־פְּנֵי הָאֲרָמָה]]), De 9:20 + 16 t. Dt, Jos 7:12 (acc. [[הַחֵרֶם]]; + [[מִקִּרְבְּכֶם]]), Jos 9:24 +4 t. Jos (all R:D), 2Ki 14:16, 1Ki 13:34, Am 9:8, Is 13:9, Is 26:14, Es 3:6, Es 3:13 + 23 t.; acc. [[פִּרְיוֹ וְשָׁרָשָׁיו]] (fig.) Am 2:9, cf. Ez Eze 34:16 (but Vrss Co Toy al. [not Hi Krae] [[אֶשְׁמׂר]]); [[אֶת־שְׁמִי]] ´[[הִשׁ]]: 1Sa 24:22 (Gi v:1Sa 24:21), 2Sa 22:38, 1Ki 16:12, Ps 145:20; [[הַשְׁמֵר]] as subst., Is 14:23 besom of extermination; acc. [[אֶת־הַבַּעַל]] 2Ki 10:28, of extirpating Baal-worship [[מִיִּשְׂרָאֵל]]. †
destroy, cities Mic 5:13, fortresses Is 23:11, bamoth Le 26:30 (H), Nu 33:52 (P; ‖[[אִבֵּד ]]), [[חׂזֶק מַמְלְכוֹת הַגּוֹיִם]] Hag 2:22.
